item.title: Common search functions in emacs
item.description: The plan Create bindings to query natural language models for suggestions Generate relevant natural language queries guru99 project management 1 2 3 4 (defun my-egr-guru99 (query) (interactive (list (read-string "egr:" "guru99 "))) ;; (sps (concat "eww " (q (car (str2list (sn (concat "gl " (q query)))))))) (eww (car (str2list (sn (concat "gl " (q query))))))) github repositories Search google Download Browse
